metadata.name: Hondo

reference.reference: Environmental Emergencies Technology Division, experimental data, Environment Canada, Ottawa, Ontario, 1983-1989; and Emergencies Science Division, experimental data, Environment Canada, Ottawa, Ontario, 1990- 1996. Presently referred to as the Emergencies Science and Technology Section (ESTS) of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)

metadata.comments: The Hondo platform lies 40 km west of Santa Barbara (OGJ 92b). The sample analyzed by ESD was identified as 'Hondo', but is more similar to  Hondo Monterey than to Hondo Blend.

status: W009: Distillation fraction recovered is missing or invalid
